title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6400.4 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6400.4 - Fees

State Regulations

The fee for photocopies of records shall be 25 cents per page
not exceeding 81/2 inches by 14 inches in size. The fee for other types of
copies shall be such reasonable amount as the records access officer shall
establish. Notwithstanding the above, the records access officer may, in his or
her discretion, waive all or any portion of the fees authorized by this section
for any record or class of records. At the request of any applicant, the
records access officer shall certify, free of charge, that any record made
available to the public pursuant to this Part is a genuine copy of a council
record. There shall be no fee for inspection of records or for searching for
records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9

6400.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
